titles.title: Water Advanced Technologies for Efficient Resource Use Act of 2017
To encourage water efficiency.
Water Advanced Technologies for Efficient Resource Use Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Government Reform, Armed Services, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
